Reviews.Title: Ehhh...it is what it is....
Reviews.Author: Shannan
Reviews.Content: UPDATED MARCH 5, 2014I am starting to hate this more by the day!! This is WIFI only and well, my WIFI is constantly disconnecting!! It's not just my home network, but anywhere I go!! Thought maybe it was just me, but is asked hubby how his was since I bought them both at the same time last week, and his is doing the same thing!! Ugh...ORIGINAL REVIEW:I'm an Android fan and when my Android crashed, I decided hey I'll buy not one, but two of these things!  Ugh...my hubby loves it, I hate it :(Pros:It is super fast!The battery life is unbelievable! Hubby played games for three hours straight and lost only 20% of the battery life!  I spent hours downloading apps and using them and had the same result. I've been using it non stop since 7am and it's now 10:30am, played my games, used Facebook and a few apps, and now reviewing...I'm at 75%. My android would have been dead long ago as well as the other cheap tablet we have.Cons: my opinion keep that in mind...It's too much of a hassle typing when you're used to a smaller screen. I'm a very fast typist, and this thing is just too big for my liking. Did I know the size? Duh! I may return it for a smaller Android though. If you need a large screen, this is perfect! My mother in law and hubby love it, but again, if you like the smaller screens, it's hard to get accustomed to.Takes FOREVER to set up! Omg, you have to create an IPad ID, an Apple ID, confirm this, confirm that, ugh...Finding apps seems to be mission impossible!  I go to the store, they aren't there!  But if I go to the browser and search, it gives me the Apple download and then I get it. So where the heck was it hiding??All in all, this is one of those 50/50 deals, either you're an IPad lover, or an Android lover. If you love Androids, don't bother. If you love Apple products, it's probably a must have!!

Reviews.Title: Disclaimer: I a true Apple Fan, only recently converted...
Reviews.Author: T. Clifton "Techie Tony"
Reviews.Content: I'll mix it up a little and start with the things I don't like about the iPad 2. I sold my iPad 2 a while back, but I now have an iPad 3 and iPad Air. 4 iPhones, and an iMac.  On the other side of the fence I own a Kindle Fire HDX 7", and did own a 7" Lenovo tablet, both of which I like also.  Obviously the only draw-back I can think of with the iPad 2 is the poor resolution, which probably isn't even that big of a deal to some people. To me it's a deal breaker, and that is why I sold my iPad 2, however when I got the iPad 3 and realized how much heavier it was, I actually kind of regretted getting rid of my older version!  I absolutely love the light weight of the 2, ALMOST as much as I love the Retina display of the successive models.  I honestly can't tell any real difference in the speed of the 2, vs. the 3, vs even the Air! I guess I'm not all that much into games anymore, which is probably the only place the upgraded power and speed of the newer iPads would ever come in to play anyway!  As I mentioned before, the Retina display to me is a very worthwhile tradeoff even for a heavier iPad.  I actually prefer my iPad w/ Retina and keyboard case to a much more expensive Mac book Air, without Retina display. The reason being, no matter how close you set the iPad to your eyes (such as laying in bed with it sitting on your chest, the clarity is just like reading printed material right out of a book, and to me that's more important than a big screen any day of the week! I much prefer the new fire wire charging cables over the 32 pin one that the iPad 2, android tablets, and other phones use.  I hate having to worry about which side is supposed to be up or down...  The reason I would go with an iPad 2 over any of the other Android tablets, including the Kindle Fire, even though probably all the android tablets have far superior hardware for the same amount of money, is that iEnvironment. iOS, iTunes, iCloud, better quality apps, even from the exact same software on iOS vs. Android.  Owning something from Apple is not about a status symbol or anything like that for me, to me it's like owning a piece of art that makes my heart go pitter-pat every time I pick one up or sit down to relax with one on my chest.  My satisfaction and joy of owning and using such device with such a OS and compatibility with everything in my book is well worth the extra money that Apple charges for their devices.  I'm also very proud to support an American company, versus a Chinese or Korean one... sorry, but do you haters even stop to think that all the Chinese and Korean equipment use poorly paid and poorly cared for cheap labor in China just like Apple does... duh!

Reviews.Content: This iPad is working great.  Thought I was having trouble with it.  Turned out the problem was with my wireless router.  I upgraded my router and all worked well.  It takes more throughput to run the iPad than to run my laptop, so the it took me a while to troubleshoot since I was still using my laptop wirelessly every day.  I would reset the general settings on iPad, and it would be able to connect to the internet for a bit.  There was an update that I needed, but it crashed the whole thing every time I tried to download it.  Bought a new modem/wireless router at Officemax, hooked all up, and everything is working great!  (Obviously I don't have a contract with AT&T; yet)

Reviews.Title: After 2 years
Reviews.Author: sauprankul
Reviews.Content: I got this iPad in October 2011, according to the engraving on the back, and since 2 years seems to be the extent of most gadgets' life these days, I simply had to make a review. A good one, of course.PROS:Weight: By far, the most amazing thing about this tablet is that it weighs so little. I believe it weighs less than any other iPad out there, which is weird, but I think the iPad mini is supposed to cater to those who have a problem with that. The iPad isn't meant to be held in one hand, though. It's a real personal computer, only in tablet from, and you must treat it as such. If you need to be able to read in bed or something, get a kindle or iPad mini. However, you'll find that the iPad is very convenient for most uses.Design: The front of the iPad is defined by a single pane of multitouch glass - and a home button. The back is made of aluminum. There is a front camera, a rear camera in the top right corner, and a speaker at the bottom. This simplistic design, which Apple litigiously fought for against Samsung, is in a word, magical. I'm not too much into the marketing stuff, but seriously, there is something extremely premium about Apple products, and I am sure it is more than the pseudo philosophical marketing. The Smart Cover actually works really well, though its necessity is... debatable. Overall, this tablet feels like its worth 500 dollars. Ok, so it's 400 now, but you know what I mean.Durability: The primary user of this tablet is an unhygienic now-9-year-old who is not exactly dexterous and immediately gets on it after school, sin lavar sus manos. If you know glass, you know that the only thing that can really scratch it are minerals. That's right. Not knives or cleats, though they may if you try hard enough. It's finger salts, salt from food, dust, dirt, sand, jewelry like diamonds and quartz. However, today I wiped off all the prints with a damp hand towel and I could count, I kid you not, 3 micro scratches. That's amazing. This tablet has been dropped, probably not from extreme heights, but still. The glass at the corners, along with the aluminum housing, is tattered. There are several deep scratches in the aluminum on the back. However, there are no functional damages to this tablet. That's also very nice. You probably don't need the Smart Cover for its protective aspect. You will however, want it so you can use it for support. It helps a lot.Display: Eek. I'll kick it to you straight; the resolution of this screen is terrible. If your going to be looking at pictures, you're going to be disappointed. 1024x768 doesn't cut it. My 4.5 inch S2 had a resolution of 800x640. I thought it was sub par, but acceptable. The iPad is just bleh. It's colors are amazing though. I don't know too much about outdoor performance, but I've never felt that brightness was an issue, so it's probably ok. What the iPad lacks in detail more than makes up in size. Laying down in bed with a ten inch screen feels so empowering. I feel like I have all the media in the world in my hands, and I almost do.Apps: I don't use my iPad for work. It stays at home most of the time, and at home, I have my desktop. I would assume it would be pretty easy to use iWork to create, but I wouldn't know. *flame alert* I believe Android is better for smartphones, and iOS for tablets. There is a serious lack of tablet apps for android, but I am continually surprised at the growing iOS tablet app ecosystem. However, there are a greater variety of apps on Android, in my experience. The iPad can actually handle games pretty well, despite its age. That all I really need to say. There isn't any calculator or weather or stocks app, but you'll find great alternatives in the App Store.Camera: Why are you reading this? What are you doing with your life? Why would you want to use the iPad's camera for anything except FaceTime? Seriously? Well, that's all you're going to be able to do, because the cameras on the 2 are terrible. Really. I would expect more for 500 bucks, but whatever. It's not a priority. If you ever find yourself in so dire a situation that you need to use the iPad camera, you better invest in a disposable, or something.Battery life: Ho ho. Tee hee. The battery life of the 2 makes me want to giggle. Even 2 years later, the battery life still feels virtually infinite. I can almost guarantee you, you will never have a problem with the iPads battery life. This is because if the square cube principle. The surface area (screen size) increases at rate of the dimensions, squared. The volume, cubed. More volume means more battery. So, theoretically, the bigger the device, the longer the battery life. Oh, and iOS is super efficient, almost forgot that.Performance: Welp, iOS7 is here. Anybody with anything older than 2012 must upgrade to escape the lag! Not so. Though the animations in iOS7 are super slow and can induce "motion sickness", the iPad 2 handles it pretty well. (I swear, auto correct has something against the word we'll.) The gaming isn't bad for such an old device, though I have yet to try out newer games like asphalt 8. However, you'll be able to stream video (not in hd, of course!) and play 2d games  with no hitches. The keyboard does sometimes take a while to pop up and apps do take somewhat longer to load, but hey, we're talking about an old geezer tablet here.Features: I haven't been able to use Bluetooth to transfer files yet, presumably because Apple wants me to upgrade and use AirDrop. Classic Apple. And I'm pretty sure Siri could easily run on the 2. Oh well, looks like we're stuck with... The two doesn't have any gimmicks, per se, to it. It has the dual cameras, but that's about it. There is nothing to show off. Just to experience. FaceTime is great, though. Like, wow. It's really the best video chat technology I've ever seen. If nothing else, I would commend apple on its FaceTime infrastructure. It's simple and fun and convenient, not to mention powerful.Overall: Even after 2 years of not so nice treatment, my 2 is functionally perfect. It really feels amazing to be able to consume content on such a big screen. The thinness and lightness of the device make it disappear as you're using it. FaceTime really is the best interpersonal video chat platform as of today. IOS 7 runs fine on this, but don't expect to be so lucky next year. I was actually shocked to see the price here on Amazon. Really? 400 bucks for a 2011 tablet? When the 5 is just around the corner and will cost only 100 more? Only a fool would buy it now. However, the 2 really bolstered the image of Apple I had. I have a first gen Nano that actually still works for a whole day! I would expect the iPad to do the same. This review isn't recommending that you buy the 2. All I'm saying is that Apple makes the best tablets out there. Even the most hardcore Android fanatic (which I am dangerously close to) could agree on some levels. iPads are feat for consuming content. Maybe even for creating. However, if you want to get real work done, you're going to want to wait for the next generation of windows 8 pro tablets with Broadwell Chips in them. I need an IDE to be able to do programming when I go to college, and the fact that no such software is available for iOS means that I can't take this there. The iPad isn't a complete replacement for a real computer. But it comes pretty darn close.Sent from my iPad

After ios 6&7 came out his ipad 1  was no longer able to keep up with the technology of the upgraded apps. I purchased the 64g ipad 2 so he would have plenty of room for his apps since some of the apps can be large downloads. i am able to also to limit what he is able to do in settings and the app store. He can only get apps ifi unlock it. ipad 2 was easy to child lock certain features and content. ipad 2's long battery is great on trips, it keeps him busy and i dont need active wifi for his apps to work. I wish that ipad existed with my other children. I like that he is learning on current to future technology that most daycares or preschools can not provide.  I recommend this to any parent. Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 (64GB AT&T; 3G)
Reviews.Author: Dr. Daniel Brewer
Reviews.Content: I have been an owner of an Apple iPad 2 (64GB AT&T; 3G) since the date of it's first released in the US on March 11, 2011. After more than two years of heavy use both personally and professionally I can say the Apple iPad changed my life. It is without a doubt one of the most innovative, useful, and powerful products on the market. That was true in April of 2010 when Apple released the first iPad, and it remains true to this day. An unimaginable number of iPad reviews exist online, so I will not restate the specs or the seemingly endless uses and applications. I will simply state that I have never regretted my purchase of my iPad for one second and I have found it to be one of the most versatile, useful, and simple pieces of technology I have ever owned. It's multipurpose functionality cannot be overstated. I cannot speak highly enough of the Apple iPad - and look forward to the day when I can upgrade to the latest model. Even so, my iPad 2 continues to be fully functional, fast, and sturdy. Why wait - BUY APPLE!

Reviews.Title: The product was literally new
Reviews.Author: dario
Reviews.Content: I bought several things on the web, things that were considered "NEW" and actually they weren't.This time everything changed, the product was literally new, no use at all and I saved a lot of money.I've been a long term Apple customer and will be forever.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Sherrie
Reviews.Content: Apple iPad 2 MC979LL/A Tablet (16GB, Wifi, White) 2nd Generation...In perfect condition with a screen protector....that was a surprice :)Love it love it love it.  Great price!

Reviews.Title: typical apple product
Reviews.Author: Mike Harte
Reviews.Content: apple wants to lync all your apple devices. instead they should concentrate on the ipad being setup as a stand alone device. Had to have customer support just to set it up.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Becky Buckler
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad to replace one that only had Wifi.  Now I am able to access the information I need even in places where Wifi is not available.  If I can use my cell phone, I can use my iPad!

Reviews.Title: tootie
Reviews.Author: tootie
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and the person who received it was very happy.  She has used it now for two months and no problem with the product. Yes I would recommend this company in the future.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Morse "cynmor"
Reviews.Content: It's been a real time saver and occupier for my child. Thank you for the smooth machine. So far so good

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: chris stern
Reviews.Content: Terrific buy; I love this iPad! Nasty scratch on screen but I can live with it.....so happy to finally own an iPad...thank you.

Reviews.Title: Just "meh".
Reviews.Author: Jessie Ivey
Reviews.Content: I wish I would have gotten a newer model. I pretty much have given up on this thing, so many apps that I would like to have don't work because it's outdated. I love the iPad in general and still plan to keep it for a while, but it's functionality leaves a lot to be desired. The NPR app works perfectly which is really great, and I mostly just use it for portfolio purposes and if I don't feel like carrying around a bulky laptop. Please listen to folks who tell you that this is not a replacement for a laptop, they are not lying. Seriously. Don't get rid of your damn laptop.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous- what a great Ipad for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Happy Girl
Reviews.Content: I ordered this since I just wanted an IPAd 2 for fun, so why pay for a new one? The price was amazing but I got skeptical after reading some of the seller's reviews.  I wrote the seller myself and was reassured of the product.  It came in 2 days, was well wrapped, it was called Very Good condition- a few scratches on the back, but basically perfect.  It came with an older cover ($40.00 is what it said, but definatley not worth that today, but hey it's a cover), 2 charge cords, clean and working perfectly.  I just ran up to TJ Max to get a new cover- and it really looks like a brand new IPAd for about half the price!  I know I got a very good deal and was happy to have the seller write back immediately for all my concerns, making sure that I was pleased with the product. Don't know what happened to others, but I am very pleased with this product and the responses of the seller.  This was a great deal and I am enjoying every second of my "new" ipad for a great price.  Just get the seller's  email and ask questions if you have them- I feel they were very helpful  and concerned.  Even though this was cheap , it is still a major purchase for me and I feel that this purchase was made in confidence and carried through exceeding my expections.  Thanks IPAD MANIA!

Reviews.Title: The best purchase I've ever done
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Beasley
Reviews.Content: I know the results will vary, but this was the absolute best purchase I've ever made!! The iPad was completely like new! Not a single scratch front or back! They shipped fast too. I was very please over all, and this was definely a good buy!!!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Michele Cross
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad, it more than satisfied my expectations but my grandson has taken over possession of it! When I finally get to use it it's GREAT,

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: Larry G
Reviews.Content: Delivery was timely and the packaging was done well. This product meets all of my computer needs and I will use it exclusively in lieu of my laptop and desk top computers.

Reviews.Title: No AppleCare
Reviews.Author: Elaine Costello
Reviews.Content: I returned the iPad because I could not get applecare on a used iPad and I also needed a data pkg so I could get internet access anywhere I needed it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Walter OBrien
Reviews.Content: This iPad is great. I love the size and all that I can do with it. Not a thing negative to say about it,

Reviews.Title: I bought white and got black
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: It is a good iPad and does everything thing a iPad needs to do.  I was so excited to get this that I did not notice that it was black, when we ordered white, till about a week later!  I wish it was white but black does the same thing as the white one does so we are fine with it.  I didn't send it back because we had it set up already.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Lego
Reviews.Content: Great ipad. Easy to use. Everything in one place. Can access Music, internet, email. Ideal for a school student since it's lightweight and portable.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Tasha Downum
Reviews.Content: Great for Traveling or watching movies. It shipped and was delivered in sooner than expected! It did have a dent on the side which doesn't allow me to turn the volume up or down, contacted the company they offered to replace it, I decided to keep it anyway because I had already uploaded everything on it. I just adjust the volume in the media screen.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars from me on my iPad2!
Reviews.Author: Bonnie L. Thayer
Reviews.Content: I love this iPad, it was easy to get it going, connected right away to wi-fi. The screen is big so my older eyes can see well, it's lighter then my freinds iPad 1, it synced up with iTunes well. Was nicer then described by seller and shipping was fast!

Reviews.Title: Great Ipad
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: This is a great Ipad in wonderful shape. This is my second one I have a 32gb I wanted one with more memory the 64gb this the way to go.

Reviews.Title: amazing for the price...
Reviews.Author: latisha
Reviews.Content: i just bought this ipad 2 on the may 19th  and i got on the 22nd i recieved it fast and i am very pleased with this it and it is a 32 gb and the price was 314.00 that was a great price and i got it just in time because i got the last one but i only paid 300.00 because of the money i had saved on my account and bought some cases and other items with the money on my account it said used but it only had 3 marks on it 1 on the screen and 2 on the back it was like new to me just for 3 marks thats nothing and coming from a andorid tablet to an ipad it feels amazing and i love it... once again i paid 300.00  but the price was 314.00 for a ipad 2 32gb used.  AMAZING AND WONDERFUL....

Reviews.Title: Used iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Nixon Peter
Reviews.Content: The item was shipped faster than I thought and is in good condition. It came with the charger and cable as described but with scratches on the back which were pretty intense. Though if it's in the iPad cover  it can't be noticed coz the screen is in perfect condition. All in all the item was and still is good!

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Patricia M Marshall
Reviews.Content: GOOD QUALITY, EXACTLY WHAT WAS ADVERTISED.  WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS ITEM TO FRIENDS.  I REALLY LIKE THE CONSTRUCTION OF THE PRODUCT AS WELL.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: forevablessed13
Reviews.Content: Heard of all the iPads that were made this was the best generation of them all, I even saw the drop test & the battery test on YouTube, over all this was a better purchase. And I'm still enjoying it till now!!!

Reviews.Title: IPad-2
Reviews.Author: Patrick M.
Reviews.Content: This was a Mother's Day gift for my wife.  I ordered it on Friday and it came on Saturday, just in time for Mother's Day.  Very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: enough said
Reviews.Author: Nefertiti
Reviews.Content: it came as expected brand new and was really nice. I still enjoy it and never got tired of using it.

Reviews.Title: The ipad is small and compact for taking it with you!
Reviews.Author: sheila scott
Reviews.Content: I find it easy to use and especially like emailing with it. I use it every day and love how organized it keeps me.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I also would like to consider a mini ipad.This product is great. Thinking also to get one as a gift but looking for another price value.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT iPAD 2
Reviews.Author: Beatrice
Reviews.Content: I bought this refurbished iPad 2 (32 GB, Wifi+AT&T; 3G for my husband's birthday because he won't leave mine alone. Mine is also a refurb but I I bought it at Apple online and spent about $700.00 for it compared to Rocket Jakes price of $399. A Genius at Apple told me he prefers refurbished products as any FACTORY quirks that existed are straightened out. The iPad was simple to set up. It was in original Apple packaging and works perfectly. The AT&T; Wi-fi was also easy to set up. AT&T; has lower data charges for iPads than Verizon but Verizon has a larger coverage area. Alas! Money is tight. I also got a Smart Magnetic Cover for Apple Ipad 2 cover at Amazon from CyprusTech for $7.74 compared to the $39 I spent for mine at Apple and it looks and acts exactly the same. I'm thrilled with this product so far but I set it up with my Apple ID and now I'm going to have to jump through some hoops to figure out how to get my husband his own Apple ID because iTunes is all set up on one computer with MY Apple ID ....h-h-m-m-m! Another tech challenge.

Reviews.Title: Omg I love it
Reviews.Author: Tia LaFlesh
Reviews.Content: We travel and have medical appointments all over two states and  this has allowed my to take my college class with me while staying in touch with my family while we r away

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Serena
Reviews.Content: I noticed that I made a mistake on my previous feedback, and want to correct it. This seller has Super Fast shipping ! I really love my Ipad its just what i was looking for!

Reviews.Title: This is my second one
Reviews.Author: cheryl h.
Reviews.Content: I was so pleased with my first i-pad that I bought another one for my brother in Thailand.  I was also very pleased that it arrived in such a short time.

Reviews.Title: Great product for Mom

Reviews.Content: Hopefully less tech support issues.  I have an ASUS tablet myself and I found the iPad 2 touch screen to be sub-par by comparison.  Was much easier to set-up thought.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Julie Riley "stella79"
Reviews.Content: The iPad is great I sent it to my husband in Afghanistan and he loves it.  I was glad to find one that was black and was a 32GB it was a great price and was delivered quickly and in packed well for protection.Thank you

Reviews.Title: Good product

Reviews.Content: Fast and dependable. Easy to use.  Only down side is its not compatible with many down loads for listing to music online or silver lite which I needed for a website I was trying to take a test on.

Reviews.Title: ipad 2 att 3g wifi
Reviews.Author: anacortez01
Reviews.Content: work really well - and great price for ipad - only needed lcd replaces and sim crad reader fixed . didnt cost to much to fix thank you uarizona

Reviews.Title: So sweet ( He really cared)
Reviews.Author: chelsie park
Reviews.Content: Product sent was better than described. He described it as in very good shape- I would say excellent (like new) It was in the original packaging. He threw a new cover also.I was very pleased!! Than he followed up! I felt like he was professional, and he cared.I hopefully will get to do business with them again:)Chelsie

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Content: It works well and it's very fast, I'm actually glad I brought it and I am enjoying it, I receive it more quicker then I expected.

Reviews.Title: Great Tool!

Reviews.Title: Love my ipad

Reviews.Content: My ipad is the best!  Came in perfect condition and it contains all my favorite books and music that more space to spare.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Brian Tapparo
Reviews.Content: very easy to operate fast at downloading and very convient when i dont have a computer at my access great product

Reviews.Title: iPad works great!

Reviews.Content: The iPad works great! The only issues I have is it is not comparable to get kindle bookson amazon.  Some of of my apps did not sync up together either but overall the IPad works really well and I have no other issues.

I do love it and wish I knew all the things it can do.  I need to find an Apple store near me to go with my thousands of questions.  I did a live chat once about it, and they were wonderful in helping me understand what to do out of the box.

Reviews.Content: I love my ipad 2.  I have a small jewelry business and now able to accept debit and credit cards using my ipad 2, as a result of this my sales have doubled!  I also use my ipad 2 when I travel, I can get quick directions and find hotels and places of interest.  I no longer have to lug around my laptop computer,

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Irene Thiry
Reviews.Content: works grate and i love being able to do thing when my bf is tacking a nap i can still check my mail and other thing all day  long

Reviews.Title: 2nd Gen iPad
Reviews.Author: Sandra Stacy
Reviews.Content: I'm still trying to figure it all out, but my grandson loves it!  He's only 9 and can do almost anything with it already.  Great babysitter and he's learning things too!  Couldn't ask for more....

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 all the way
Reviews.Author: vegeta
Reviews.Content: The iPad 2 is a good tool for those that don't have an iPad 3. I got it for my girlfriend and she has no complaints except for the middle button giving her issues. It only happened twice, but it stopped after a while. I recommend it for all.

Reviews.Title: It's an iPad.....What More Can You Say
Reviews.Author: Brittany F.
Reviews.Content: I brought this one to replace the one I let my grandma borrow that she won't give back.  It is the perfect tablet for the whole family. My 5 year old God-daughter can use it with ease, as well as my 69 year old grandmother. I love that Apple has restrictions under the settings that I can turn off everything, so my God-daughter won't purchase everything by simply clicking a button. I hardly use my laptop at all because this does everything my laptop can do.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad
Reviews.Author: Kathie Moore
Reviews.Content: I'm new to the IPad but I'm finding it easier as I get accustomed it.  It takes time to figure out all the options,  I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Reliable tool
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: As usual, Apple gives you a tool that does not fail. My only concern is its operative system: you are led to spend money with Apple every two strokes. The customizable past of the Mac is not present in this device.

Reviews.Title: I Love this Gadget!
Reviews.Author: Richard Anderson "Rick Anderson"
Reviews.Content: I love this thing...use it constantly.  Wi-Fi works really well.  It keeps me from running into the next room to check for emails all the time.  It's small.  it's convenient and well worth the price.  I have not had any problems with my ipad..

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE IPAD !!!!
Reviews.Author: Jorge Dardon
Reviews.Content: Apple is the best ...bought the ipad for work does everything it was intended for ..great resolution fast response ..size a little annoying definitely will consider mini !! Better yet it paid for itself in its first week!!!!just by posting ads online ...dardin810@gmail.com ..email me and I can tell you how I paid for my ipad it's first week !!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my husband on a budget. I have an iPad already but he wanted one as well. It came in very fast and in wonderful condition! He thought it was brand new! I obviously did good! Lol. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: rdav
Reviews.Content: The touch screen worked reasonably well.  Needed to buy a screen guard to view the screen outdoors, but haven't had any other problems so far.  This was a refurbished unit, so there were some scratches on the case as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Still a powerful tool
Reviews.Author: Mark J
Reviews.Content: This was my choice for a first-time tablet user who has a similar one in her household. It meets her needs very well.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the iPad. I especially wanted it to create documents, transfer documents from my laptop, and to do my sermons and presentations on. It really has been great! My only criticism is that Apple doesn't have a warranty on it.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: sulekwi
Reviews.Content: What can I say. I enjoy my iPad so much that I ended up buying two more of them  it would be to your advantage to buy one with more memory if you are a photo enthusiast like myself .

Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my husband on a budget. I have an iPad already but he wanted one as well. It came in very fast and in wonderful condition! He thought it was brand new! I obviously did good! Lol. Thank you!

Reviews.Content: What can I say. I enjoy my iPad so much that I ended up buying two more of them  it would be to your advantage to buy one with more memory if you are a photo enthusiast like myself .

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2 review
Reviews.Author: John N. Churchill
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my new iPad 2.  It'll take a while to explore all of the possibilities.  But it is already a useful thing to have.

Reviews.Title: Better than described!
Reviews.Author: Tera Williams
Reviews.Content: The iPad was in even better condition than described. It works perfectly and looks great. I'm using It to write this review :)

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Wolf
Reviews.Content: Bought these for my wife's Ipad. She loves it. They make it easy to clean spills and wipe things off of it.

Reviews.Title: This tablet was a gift for my daughter.
Reviews.Author: maria
Reviews.Content: She absolutely loves it, She she says is easy to use and she use it 24/7. The price was right too

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my daughter and she carries it everywhere
Reviews.Author: Charles Wright
Reviews.Content: Not an Apple fan, but my daughter is. She uses her iPad more than her laptop now. She wouldn't know what to do without it.

Reviews.Title: Its white! :D
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love white things.iPad its usefull, thin, fast and simple to use. There is no way to go wrong with this tabletYou'll notice the difference.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Device for book reding and Net Surfing
Reviews.Author: Amilcar Ramirez
Reviews.Content: A Notation their safari flash plug in is not available;hence is a money maker for third party net surfing providers such as Firefox and Photom! I I almost venture my self buying flash from apps. good thing I did not, it does not help my video conferencing business. Until a patch is created by apple for it some of us will have to Mickey Mouse it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, easy to use, fast, portable
Reviews.Author: David W Duce
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, purchased used, was in very good condition and worked right out of the box.  Good battery life. WiFi is readily accessible.

Reviews.Title: is it necessary?
Reviews.Author: Daniel Grajales
Reviews.Content: Really. Do I need to write a review for an IPAD? works great! you know it all about IPADs... enjoy!

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Ray Moss
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my techophobe wife. She took to it like a duck to water and now uses it all the time!

Reviews.Title: Handy business tool
Reviews.Author: Margaret Spurgers
Reviews.Content: I bought the IPad 2 for use at the office and wouldn't be without it.  I can keep up with the office, emails or surf the internet easily.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Ganesh Bashiyam
Reviews.Content: I was hesitate to buy ipad, but finally ended up in buying 2nd generation. My kids love the ipad, received the shipment on time. works great! Really excited!

Reviews.Title: Top Notch!
Reviews.Author: Shara Johnson
Reviews.Content: Honestly, my Ipad 2 is really hard for me to put down. It took me barely no time to figure out how to use it even being a first time user of an apple product. Since I fell so much in love with this product, I even take it to church with me! Bless the Lord lol.

Reviews.Title: IPad
Reviews.Author: Roberta B. Wojcik "Mommybabes"
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I expected.  Great price for Gen 2 without 3G. This is my 1st Apple product and I am going to only buy Apple from now on.

Reviews.Title: IPad
Reviews.Author: Roberta B. Wojcik "Mommybabes"
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I expected.  Great price for Gen 2 without 3G. This is my 1st Apple product and I am going to only buy Apple from now on.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Echavarria
Reviews.Content: I'm writing to express how satified I am with my iPad.  I think it was one of the best investments I have ever made, I pratically use it for everything writing papers  for college, music, photos, videos, surfing the wed, games and email. My iPad has practically replaced my two laptops.  I'm not recommending to get rid of your laptop and get an iPad because there are certain things I can not  do on my iPad that only my laptop can do the job, but you should definately get one for its portability, accessibility and great battery life.  I was so impressed with my Ipad I went out and purchased an ipad mini this was in a 3 month period. Also plan to upgrade my regular ipad for the new edision with 120gs and my laptop with an Mac Air. I really like Apple products and wish I would have taken advantage of their products sooner.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Jyri Ketola
Reviews.Content: It was a good find, reasonable price and excellent condition. It has been very usefull and filled all my expectations. Only problem is, that there are so many features which you don't use so often and then you forgot how to use them. That's ofcourse more like a personal problem..

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: Andy Mack "Garageman"
Reviews.Content: The price was right, the iPad perfect.  A "complaint"?  Yes.  I don't apprecitate the little ad's that show up!  And why no user's guide?  If it weren't for some friends with an iPad2 for help, I don't know what I would be doing right now.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: B. Murray "B. J. Murray"
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase.  It was like brand new and the warranty was still on it.  Excellent service as well.

Reviews.Title: ipad
Reviews.Author: Desiree Kuhnle
Reviews.Content: We got our grand son an ipad of his own for his last birthday (6).  He had played with mine every time he came over so it was an easy gift to give.  He knows how to maneuver around.  I did get a more sturdy case for it recently.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Greg Bushman
Reviews.Content: Wife loves this, she uses it all the time.  Great investment.  everyone should own one, I might even buy another

Reviews.Title: More of a play toy :\
Reviews.Author: karis jones "K.Jones"
Reviews.Content: The Ipad2 is generally well responsive and quick however there are a few malfuctions/weak points where it could of been made better. I test out tablets/ e-readers because I need them for school/coursework however The Apple Ipad has poor buisness apps and tools. The notes apps are very basic and less focused on. Apple mainly foucuses on its apps and games which attract the younger population. For example it has more Angry Birds Apps then your fingers on your hand! Some strong points are the Facebook app, Facetime(Similar to Skype) and Itunes. Not my taste of tablet and I will be selling it soon.

Reviews.Title: Great iPad
Reviews.Author: cody white "cj"
Reviews.Content: i got this ipad for my birthday and i love it it is amazing it does just about everthing i want but it does not come with a user guide you have to download that yourself otherwise i reccomend it !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: hector
Reviews.Content: Im Was worry abut buy somthing like this because You dont know what You getting on Mail but. Its an a greate experience

Reviews.Title: No Apple Care for this purchase
Reviews.Author: Helen Siegel
Reviews.Content: I loved the iPad but when I approached apple with the purchase receipt and asked to add Apple care they said because the seller was considered the original owner I was declined. So I returned it and bought an I pad from Apple directly.

Reviews.Title: A little upset
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Making this super short, bought refurbished and a part of the screen doesnt compleately work all the time, its like a line going down the screen that is unresponsive to an extent.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: ALEXA "ALEXA OAKS"
Reviews.Content: It is beyond amazing. It works perfectly and it is very helpful. It does more than I thought. Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Best bargains.
Reviews.Author: john l geissler
Reviews.Content: The is a good value for this wanting sonmething nicer than the ordinary pad. Looks great and comes with a fast ship

Reviews.Title: Apple ipad 2
Reviews.Author: fashionista
Reviews.Content: I was not sure if I would get what I paid for but it was more than I imagine! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Makenzie VanGorder
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my fiance for a spur of the moment gift and he loves it. It was in great condition and works just as well as mine, which I purchased at Target. Great price and great product. I love the Apple portable products.

Reviews.Title: so great!!
Reviews.Author: jessica ausec
Reviews.Content: i'm so happy with my ipad! i use it for school and it works like a charm! so happy that i dropped money on this thing!

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2 is good but not great.
Reviews.Author: J. Chang
Reviews.Content: First, I am tech savvy. I mainly use a PC. I have owned an iphone before. Don't use macs. This is my first ipad. It was given to me as a gift. I use android based phones.My impression is that the ipad is very much like the iphone. Exactly the way you get into the phone you do the ipad. The icons are identical. So if you're coming from those other devices it's nice to have the same icons that you're already familiar with.Overall I'm happy with the unit. My only real complaints are the camera, speakers, no siri and lack of microsd card slot. The camera is horrible. I was shocked to learn the mexapixel that comes stock on this device. I don't think it's even 1 megapixel but for taking pictures it's really bad. Very grainy. Video recording is in hd so when the video does come out the picture is good quality. But the camera pictures are horrible.The speakers are mono. I'm not sure why they are mono on such a flagship device. They sound ok but i figured you would at least get stereo speakers with something that costs over $400.Lack of microsd slot. Now this is really bad. iphones dont have them either. neither do their ipods. it's a great way for apple to make more money since you can't upgrade the storage capacity. Android tablets and phones I'm able to add up to 64gb of extra storage. So with this device I'm locked in to what storage I buy. That's apple's deal so take it or leave it.No siri. Upgrading to os 6 I thought that I would at least get siri. No. Apple won't allow that. Kinda sad for their once top of the line tablet. Ok but not really a big deal. Just would have been a nice feature.If I were in the market for a new tablet now, I would seriously consider the Samsung Note 10.1. It can do everything the new ipad can do and more.

I love having an extensive library at my fingertips. An incredible number of classics are free on iBooks, Kindle and Gutenberg.org as are lesser known works by the authors of those classics. The camera is not so hot, but I have a good camera. This one will do in a pinch. The other capabilities more than make up for the camera's deficiencies. The Facebook app makes viewing all the photos that go by on Facebook a wonderful experience. National Geographic is gorgeous on this thing.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!

And I do use it all the time, it has made my workflow a lot more enjoyable and makes things easier to view, more enjoyable to process and ties in my interests with the apps and everything. The seller who I got this from gave me a great deal and he shipped it promptly and kept up with messages to give me info about it. It came brand new sealed in its box and I have been jubilant ever since I carried the box from the post office to my house. I take it with me everywhere and I use it for a lot of different things such as checking my email, pinterest, stumble upon, writing on blogsy and pages, as well as drawing and creating custom cards on procreate (a beautiful art app) and a bunch of other apps that work with me. I do my couponing on this iPad and I just absolutely love it. I have an android wifi only device and I wanted to work with the iOS system in order to see it for myself, and I love both, for my uses, each platform resonates perfectly for me for what I use it. I am also a budding app developer and I like working both platforms. (: I love my iPad 2!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Envy
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product for everyone. The controls are simple enough for even my parents to understand (lol, I love them, but they're a little slow on the technological uptake), but the functions it provides and the apps that can be added are able to provide complex operations tailored to suit any need.The battery life is amazing. I can use it almost continuously for approximately twenty hours before I need to reuse it. Less if I'm using heavy graphics, etc. But even then it functions for around sixteen hours. It charges very quickly when turned off and plugged into the wall. The screen is very responsive, and the keyboard is not as difficult to use as I had feared (this is referring to the larger keyboard that appears when you turn the device side-ways. The smaller keyboard is more difficult, but not impossible). The only downside I see to the keyboard is that I can't select Spanish letters and accents. I hear that there may be a way to get them, but I haven't had success thus far.All in all, a wonderful device. I love it, and would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: I love this thing
Reviews.Author: Ami
Reviews.Content: We got this iPad because it can read my husbands text books out loud to him (which helps with the absorption of the massive amounts of material he has to read for grad school) but the rest of us have fallen in love with it too. I like it because its quick and easy to grab and read blogs or look up a recipe and its not nearly as hard to type on as I was afraid it might be. And it is my very best friend when it comes to road tripping with our 3 year old. Road trips went from being a terror to a very enjoyable experience with the iPad (We got an Otterbox Defender case to keep it safe when the kid has it).

Reviews.Title: I Apple
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Tyler "thx. M"
Reviews.Content: Why? Compare two things and you will know. Time and Living. If these two matter to you, then look at how convenient it is to use an Apple based appliance. Some say intuitive. I say easy. Basic. Bottom line - resourceful all the time. Time is what you save with Apple iPad 2, second generation. The core of Apple is it's safety, not programs that take up your memory and time, costly in cash and down town, called security programs. You know what I am talking about. Security for the designers and owners, but un-necessary with Apple.Easy to take-along with its weight-less characteristic, yet durable on the road in performance. Best buy for the iPad buck so far.iT InterestedMichael T

Reviews.Author: Beanie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this used through amazon at significant savings. Everything works perfectly. Like the camera on the second generation iPad. Great for using the FaceTime feature. The kids like it for the photo booth option (like the old photo booth you use to see in the malls, etc). Besides the millions of apps and games available for all ages, this is great for your e-mail, web browsing, showing your photos, watching movies through amazon instant video, netflix, or iTunes. Tons of possibilities. In our family, everyone uses it, from age 5 to 83! Terrific product. Don't be afraid to check out the used ones. I have purchased several used devices, and have never had a problem.

Reviews.Author: Grace G
Reviews.Content: The iPad2 is my first Apple product. The packaging is very nice. iPad itself looks amazing, but a bit heavier than I thought it would be. That might be me... but I always thought iPads would be a bit lighter. Nonetheless it is amazing. I use the iPad for any e-textbooks. It is easy and simple to use.The downside is that I upgraded to iOS6, anddd the preinstalled YouTube app is no longer there. I wish the app store had a better selection as well. Most apps are mehh-- ok. Also wish that one day you can delete the preinstalled apps. Some apps I really don't need.

Reviews.Title: The Apple IPad Second Generation is great!
Reviews.Author: Ms. Heeder
Reviews.Content: The Apple IPad Second Generation is awesome! When my dad got it, all he had to do to be able to use it was activate it on the computer. It has really cool features. It has a camera and it can play videos and movies. It can also play games, surf the web, and more! Sometimes my dad lets me use it. Most of the time, I enjoy using it. Also, it's pretty much a big IPod Touch. This product can be your all in one device!  I really like Apple products, and this product is a pretty good Apple product. You probably would like it if you're one of those people who like Apple products. You might not like it if you like Samsung tablets better. I think the Apple IPad Second Generation is a great product!

Reviews.Title: Amazing gift!
Reviews.Author: Caohu09
Reviews.Content: I purchased the iPad 2 as a gift for my mother to use as an ebook.She ended up surfing the web, using her email, and downloading and listening to music from it. Now I know itsnot hard to do that, nor is the iPad magical, but it was nice to give my mother something that wassimplistic, minimalistic, and very user friendly!It was also awesome that the Geniuses we willing to help her out with EVERYTHING!IF not for how cool, and sleek it looks, or for how good the product is, the customer service makes any apply product amazing!

Reviews.Title: Got it for my birthday
Reviews.Author: Valerie St John
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the iPad 2.  It's been great to just pick up and check email without having to turn on the laptop and wait for it to boot.  Also great to pick it up and take a picture without having to get the camera out and load batteries, etc.  Love the apps too!

Reviews.Title: Great device, lives up to the hype
Reviews.Author: dobrin
Reviews.Content: I've had my iPad, which I bought used, since the end of April 2012.  I bought it to read articles (both academic PDF's and online fare via Instapaper) and play silly games, and it has exceeded my expectations on both counts.  I had used both a 7" and 10" Android tablet (modded Nook Color and gTablet, respectively) and a 4th generation iPod Touch in the past for pretty much the same purposes as with the iPad, and found myself not turning them on and subsequently selling them, so I was skeptical of how useful I'd find the iPad vs. a laptop or desktop.The advantage over the iPod Touch is just a matter of real estate.  The interfaces of the universal apps that I've used (ones that are available on both the iPod Touch and iPad) are much better on the iPad.  Not to knock Android, because I was admittedly using heavily modded versions of it and didn't have access to the entire Market (now Google Play, I guess), but there really are a ton of good apps available on the App Store.  There are good, efficient implementations of board games, silly puzzle games, a perfectly fine browser experience, good Dropbox, Instapaper, and Evernote apps; I could go on, but, really, there are just a ton of ways to use the iPad well.  I don't use it for much productivity (outside of Evernote and Dropbox), so I couldn't speak to that aspect.  But as a fun device that's useful to me, it's easy to recommend it to others.  If you want to spend the extra $100 for retina display, sure, go ahead and get the third generation one.  If you're struggling between the iPad 2 and other companies' tablets, though, I say go with the Apple.

Reviews.Title: Amazing gift!
Reviews.Author: Caohu09
Reviews.Content: I purchased the iPad 2 as a gift for my mother to use as an ebook.She ended up surfing the web, using her email, and downloading and listening to music from it. Now I know itsnot hard to do that, nor is the iPad magical, but it was nice to give my mother something that wassimplistic, minimalistic, and very user friendly!It was also awesome that the Geniuses we willing to help her out with EVERYTHING!IF not for how cool, and sleek it looks, or for how good the product is, the customer service makes any apply product amazing!

Reviews.Author: Nancy N. Gray "Lillie Bo"
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the iPad. It was easy to set up and add apps. It is all I had hoped it would be.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: KrystalC
Reviews.Content: I recently made the decision to purchase an iPad. While deciding which to buy, I concluded that newer models (generations) are being made all the time and it is too hard to keep up. I ultimately chose the iPad 2 based on price.Pros:I was very impressed with how quickly my item arrived. I ordered it on a Thursday and was told I could expect it the following Wednesday-Friday. I received it the next Monday (4 days after ordering, including the weekend). In fact, i received the ipad prior to receiving the case. The packaging was great and there weren't any tears or major dents to the original box. The iPad was secure and protected.Cons: Some of the apps are not formatted for the larger screen of the iPad. For example, Instagram remains the size of a cell phone screen. There is an option to magnify the screen in the lower left hand corner, however the display becomes pixilated.Overall: I'm familiar with Apple products and am pleased with the product. It is easy to navigate and use. I am very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: A Fun and Convenient Tablet
Reviews.Author: The Life & Times of a Book Addict
Reviews.Content: At first, I thought the idea of having an iPad was silly, until my friend was telling me of the benefits of having one. I debated and after some time I got the iPad 2. Now I love it. I take it with me everywhere I go. To school, work, etc.. I use it to write, watch movies, check email, music, and the occasional games. The main thing I use it for is to read e-books. I like that I can have a Kindle app, a Kobo app, and a Nook app all in one place without having to have several different e-readers. I like to get certain books on certain apps, especially if the price for a book is more affordable than another. Having an iPad just makes things a little more convenient. I love it.

It has to be done in the computer,and then moved to the ipad. In my humble opinion apple has never been friendly,or easy to use,and its full of restrictions but WHO CARES,its an apple, its magnificent!

Reviews.Title: IPAD 2

Reviews.Title: Mostly amazing
Reviews.Author: Revan
Reviews.Content: My iPad 2 has worked great for me, and even though I originally expected that I would need more space, the 16 GBs have been plenty. However, this is my first tablet, and one thing I've noticed is that it's hard to do much besides watch movies, play games, and check email on them without some sort of a keyboard. The on-screen keyboard is just too clunky and hard to use to be very productive on. If this was easier to use, I'd give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: CL.
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my iPad, never knew I would use it so much.  At first  had second thoughts about buying a used one but so far I love it and was taking care of .  I have jet to get a bill for it and don't understand that, no one at Amonazon seems to br able to help me with that.  Thanks for a good product.

Reviews.Title: Quality is there
Reviews.Author: R. Williams
Reviews.Content: Most of the reviewers have given all the pros and cons, so I won't bore you with another list here. Like most people, I use the iPad 90% of the time on just a few Apps. For me, reading an ebook, checking stock quotes, and reading the news constitute most of what I do. It's good to have half a million Apps, but it's impossible to use that many, or even a fraction of that. I've compared the iPad to the Kindle for reading ebooks. For me, the iPad is the clear winner. In my opinion, the iPad is easier to read and is sharper, also the color is a plus. The Kindle is hard to read in low light. Maybe if you are outside, the Kindle would have the edge, but I never read outside, and I think most people don't (possibly some do at the beach). I have an iPad 1 with WiFi and 3G, and an iPad 2 with WiFi only. I think the WiFi is the way to go because of the cost savings. Sometimes the 3G is nice, but I don't use it that often. Bottom line, I can recommend either model. It's reliable, easy to use, and Apple has the updates to improve things or fix any bugs that crop up.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2 Review
Reviews.Author: Gpvegas
Reviews.Content: The Ipad2 is a very good product. I bought it when it came out from Apple. Mine was stolen a year later and I bought this one from Amazon. It is exactly as advertised and is working in perfect condition. I saved about $150. I would highly recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: I bought the Ipad as a graduation gift for my granddaughter. So far I am very pleased with it. It arrived on time and in great condition. It is being used more than I had imagined it would be! She has had absolutely no problems at all. She will be starting college and probably get great use out of it.

Reviews.Title: I love them iPad

Reviews.Content: The iPad is great and functions perfectly. I opted to get the 2nd generation with 3G and 64 gb  unit and have I activated the 3G which works good. After a little confusion regarding the shipping timeline, the seller upgraded the services to meet the expectations at no additional cost. One thing to keep in mind though is that the delivery requires a signature at delivery so for a residential delivery may get delayed if no one is home.

Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical to order from a new merchant with no ratings but I'm very happy I did.  I got an iPad at a great price and thought it was to good to be true but it was true.  I expected it to arrive next week but I got in 4 days sooner and was pleasantly surprise and very happy.  I will definitely buy from her again confident I'll get the same super fast deliver and quick response.

} } } Length:: 0:42 MinsThe iPad 2 was a great device. Nevertheless, the release of the New iPad brings forth a new question: Should you buy the now cheaper iPad 2?There are many factors to be considered when making this purchase. The main upgrades of the New iPad include retina display, faster processor, better cameras, and with iOS 6, siri. My family owns both the iPad 2 and the New iPad. Apple did not change the iPad much between these two generations. It kept the same battery life, the same thickness (almost), and the same design. Thus, it is a personal decision.The devices are very similar, and most of the cons of the iPad 2 are fixed in the New iPad. However, is the upgrade worth $100-150?Cons of iPad 2 and how the New iPad uses them:Lack of Retina Display: When the iPad 2 was released, retina display had already been seen in other apple devices, like the iPod touch 4th generation. The general public was disappointed by the lack of this feature in the iPad 2. The iPad 3 had this feature. However, I don't really notice the difference. They both appear to have excellent displays. The New iPad's improved display can only be identified in rare conditions, such as viewing upgraded apps or sharp photos. Overall, the retina display in the iPad increases the memory many apps in the app store take up. For example, many iPad 2 users posted bad reviews about Monopoly HD when they had an update that increased the memory that app took up extensively. The update of Monopoly HD did not bring any new features besides Retina display. iPad 2 users were angry because now they lost memory without any benefits.Lack of better Cameras: The iPad 2's cameras are terrible. They back facing camera is .7 megapixels. On a smaller screen this would be acceptable because it is still HD, but on a 10 in. screen photos shot by the iPad camera look pixelated. The New iPad is said to have 5 megapixel cameras. Even so, the cameras on the New iPad aren't that great. Look at the video I posted so you can see the difference yourself. The video is best viewed in full screen.Faster Processor: The iPad 2 has a decent processor and is capable of doing everything you can currently do on an iPad decently. The iPad 3 is faster, especially when loading apps. The upgrade is great but not necessary.Siri: With iOS 6, the New iPad will have exclusive new abilities like Siri. Although many are not appreciative of siri after seeing it on the iPhone, the fact that the New iPad will now have it suggests that apple will continue to do this. Apple's newest products will continue to receive features that older products won't have through updates. Thus, it may be a good idea to purchase the New iPad as another one is not expected soon.

It's actually easier to hold than the Ipad 1 which got heavy at times when I was laying down and watching a movie or show on it before bed. It's nice to carry around for college classes then carrying around a laptop, which can get heavy. Great to take notes with, type papers up, edit photos, surf the web, read, watch tv/movies/netflix, pandora, and play games! This doesn't have the retina display but I don't really need that insane graphics. If you want something that is now cheaper than the Ipad retina get this as an alternative. It's a great Tablet and still sets the bar high! 5/5

Reviews.Title: excellent hardware and service
Reviews.Author: Caminante
Reviews.Content: I bought the iPad for my wife. If you're not a Mac user, it might be a little difficult to get used to, at first, as it was for her. However, it's well worth the learning effort. After an initial slow, but fun orientation and adjustment period, she loves it. It's fun, attractive, and pretty funciontal. I found it was not good for doing my homework asssignments and heavy duty work, because of its small size and onscreen keyboard (not effecctive if you really know how to type). However, once we added a bluetooth keyboard, I thought that it really could be a good "only" computer for anyone but a hard core document writer. I certainly would consider it for myself, as a travel and meeting device, but I'm still not giving up the big comfortable screen on my desk in the office. One more important note. Customer service is superb to any I've used anywhere in my life. Representatives are friendly, responsive, well-educated and just good folks. Thanks, Mac.

Reviews.Title: A tablet-sized iPhone, sans phone
Reviews.Author: Dane Alexander "Dane"
Reviews.Content: Like most, I've been smitten by the iPad since it was released about two years ago. I couldn't justify purchasing it for the longest time because I couldn't figure out how to work it into my technology regime. It's not computer enough to replace my Macbook Pro, and it's not phone enough to replace my iPhone 4 (not the 4S) running 5.0.1. When you factor in the price, I just couldn't convince myself that the iPad was something I couldn't live without.Then the iPad 2 comes out: front- and rear-facing cameras were new, so I could use the iPad for face-timing my mom 14 hours away, but it was essentially still something halfway between a computer and an iPhone.Finally I came to a point where I could spare the $600+ dollars to purchase the cheapest iPad 2 capable of connecting to at&t;'s 3G wireless service. I ordered this iPad on January 18 and just received it yesterday, so keep in mind I've only had this thing for one day.Immediately, I can see how the iPad 2 may come off as seductive; essentially, it's a ginormous screen surrounded by a thin frame of black or white (depends on which color your purchase--I bought white) with a single button. There's no denying that it's sexy. When you turn it on (after plugging it into iTunes and completing the necessary setup) you're blown away by the crisp screen--though it's not yet on par with the Retina display of the iPhone 4 and 4S, it's a luscious screen and only the seasoned 'techie' would notice this slight inferiority. The iPad 2's screen is still better than most if not all its competition.Apple also has a leg-up on its competition with the easy integration with iTunes. If your like me and you bought the iPad 2 to simply be what it is: an iPad, somewhere in between a computer and an iPhone--then you likely won't be filling your iPad 2's limited storage with your entire music library. I opted to sync with only my recently played music, top played music, recently added music, and a few recent playlist I've made, which I'll probably replace with newer playlists as they're made. I did sync with a fair amount of the same apps that I have on my iPhone, a handful of movies, none of my ringtones (what would I use them for?) and ended up using about 9GB of the 16GB available on the iPad 2 model I purchased. And in all actuality, after the firmware files and other junk Apple puts on their products, only about 13-14GB of the 16 are available to use out of the box.As expected, web browsing and email are where the iPad 2 shines. It's very smooth, the screen shows side-screens and sub-menus simultaneously, which really makes this thing quick to use. I used a Best Buy gift card I received for Christmas to purchase Apple's aluminum wireless keyboard to connect to my iPad 2 via Bluetooth and, although the keyboard makes me occasionally reach over for a mouse (you must still use the touch-screen mechanism despite having an actual keyboard), typing is a DREAM on here now! Facebook is also very fun to use with the keyboard setup versus the onscreen keyboard or even using the Facebook app on my iPhone. Don't get me wrong, the onscreen keyboard of the iPad 2 is very usable, but I find with a screen as large as the iPad 2's, I'd prefer having an actual keyboard so as to utilize as much of the screen as possible for web browsing, emailing, Facebooking, and anything else.I wish Apple would make it more clear that for at&t; 3G models, the SIM card is not included and will need to be purchased separately. I haven't gotten around to going to my local at&t; store to pick one up, so I'm not too sure how much a SIM card will cost.All things considered, so far I'd say I'm happy that I purchased the iPad 2. It's only receiving 4 of the 5 stars because, although I'm very comfortable with using it and definitely see myself using it on a daily basis, it hasn't replaced any of my other electronics. In all actuality, it's become another separate electronic device that I've incorporated into my routine for its own purposes. The 4 of 5 stars also reflects the price; I understand that you 'get what you pay for' (which is definitely the case for the iPad 2, as it outperforms the competition on every aspect except price), but for a product to ADD to your routine rather than to REPLACE or SIMPLIFY, I think the price could come down just slightly. Even a difference of $50 might be enough to lure in some hesitant customers.

Reviews.Title: Really nice product
Reviews.Author: Phandaal
Reviews.Content: I ordered the IPAD2 3 days ago for my mother, 75 years old.She really enjoys it and like how user friendly it is. She spent hours on it already, listening to music and using the apps I installed for her.I would recommend the Ipad2 for everyone that is not really concerned about the limitations (no flash, limited customization, necessity to go through Itunes for everything...)Display is nice, sound quality is good and it is really easy to use for older people.

Reviews.Title: Excellent iPad 2
Reviews.Author: teachntec
Reviews.Content: The iPad arrived within the one day shipping by Amazon.  The packing was appropriate for this item.  I find the Apple line of consumer electronics to be very user friendly. The software is intuitive--it does and goes where you would expect it to if you were doing the same process manually. This is my first exposure to the iPad.  I highly recommend it as an addition, or replacement to other computer products.  The screen keyboard takes getting use to. It is a light touch.  I anticipated this, amd so I am using an AmazonBasics Bluetooth Keyboard for Apple iPad/iPhone. There was no contact with the seller as this was fulfilled by Amazon, but I would buy from this seller again based on a good product delivered in the described package. Buy an iPad, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 Review
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I can probably go into a dissertation about what i like with the iPad 2, but I'll just say that it is reliable, doesn't crash or perform updates everyday and does the basic tasks I need it for.  If you are debating on this or the Galaxy, it comes down to personal preference really.  If you are looking into a Kindle Fire, my daughter has one, and I can tell you there is a reason it costs $199 because it is not made as well, just the basics of using it are not as easy or efficient as the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Seller was a quick responder
Reviews.Author: kmstein
Reviews.Content: This Ipad 2 is great.  I would strongly suggest going with more space if you are going to download videos or applications.  The icloud only does music/photos.  I submitted inquiry to seller and quick response was followed addressing my questions.Thanks for the speedy response!

Reviews.Title: Consider a Macbook Air before you get too excited about the iPad2
Reviews.Author: Knight Rain "Liberty=Creativity"
Reviews.Content: After a few weeks of playing with and trying to make my iPad2 functional and integrate it into my life etc. it suddenly dawned on me that so much of what I was struggling to do ... was to make my iPad into a... notebook computer... that does the things that the Mac OS already does so well!One of the first things I did was ... BUY A Keyboard! Mac Bluetooth.Then it was the infatuation with "apps!" " GOLLY look at this! It allows me to print a document!!"  And other absurdities like that.You know? The stuff that we all have been doing well now for 10 plus years, with the buggy nightmares of the 90s, that used to make one pull hair out in Windows' frustration, now thankfully long suppressed... .I used to refer to Mac devotees as "Mac Bigots!"But after dealing with Windows security issues, and instability through every Windows generation... I finally took the plunge with a Powerbook and never looked back. If I became less than a "Mac Bigot," still I learned to love Apple's integration,  stability, sleek looks and creative tides... that happily washed over Apple's countrymen and America as a whole, like that great wave from the first iPhone.But, this is an iPad review and although I don't desire to denigrate this generally great piece of technology or even review it seriously, I  do want to you to seriously consider a Macbook Air before the iPad.Weight is a great part of the allure of the lightweight iPad...but... the new Macbook Air is only about twice as heavy and since it may be likely that the first thing you may buy is a Bluetooth keyboard... that may not be a deciding issue...because if you wish for your, oh so cool... purchase to actually be a functional input device of text... and you took touch-typing in high school... the plunking at an iPhone or iPad's screen... with one's THUMBS... or the dull end of your fingers... becomes a tedious devolution of functionality.And this is the real core of my criticism of PADS in general. They are at this point clever receivers of information but clunky input...ers. One looks for app after app to do the simplest things...  and then we say... "golly isn't that cool,  I can actually highlight text!"And guess what? That highlighting of text usually takes a few tries to get the text that you actually need to select with "TAPS" selected...to 'mark-up' a doc properly... and some compromise is usually entailed and could have been far more exactly... achieved with a mouse 30 seconds ago.Look ... do I like my iPad?Yes!And I did  order a stylus for 27 bucks and it has not come yet so I can't comment upon that helpful addition as a partial solution for... the iPad's entry flaws... .  But realize... when one peals away the COOL... and gets to the functional daily needs of email ... and entry of certain data... you will spend a good deal of your iPad time... which after all... is life time... learning to get around.. the touch screen and the operating system"s... limitations.Now ... it is true that if one has say...an iMac which I Highly recommend ... that the real question is: how much...do you actually  need to input at the coffee shop or as a quick reference in the car or as a very light travel basic communication computing device? If the answer is "not really that much..." or if putting up with the iPad's limitations for real text entry is OK on occasion... and the added weight of a keyboard is only needed part time... then it has indeed a LOT of very cool qualities and... apps too... that we actually do find we desired and... didn't even know it!!Are even... useful and yes... fun,  a LOT of fun.If you work seriously on the road... an iPad is not for you... at this time in its development... if you need a very cool slick device that is indeed just about the perfect weight and size for extreme portability happiness... and mainly want it for consumption, of information... then the iPad is wonderful.The iPad is a very creative and evolving technology. The "Cloud" Apple's and say Dropbox... are bringing all of these devices together and we all are literally with our use... defining their place and potential and the APP ecosystem is indeed VITAL... .That participation in change... is in itself fun to watch and to take part in... lets face it... our participation in that creative process by supporting what works is... a central part of an iPad's attractions... nothing wrong with that! That is the old America, remember her?Creativity  is sadly... so purposefully dimmed for political outcomes... in our dear country...that any tree of creative life left...is worth supporting even one without a real keyboard... .

Reviews.Title: iPad2 Ordered from Amazon
